## ğŸ“ˆ Improvement Areas

### Short-term Goals (Q1 2025)

- [ ] **Enhanced Monitoring**: Add comprehensive metrics collection
- [ ] **Performance Profiling**: Detailed performance analysis tools
- [ ] **User Experience**: Improved error messages and debugging
- [ ] **Integration Examples**: More integration examples and tutorials

### Medium-term Goals (Q2-Q3 2025)

- [ ] **Multi-threading**: Safe concurrent analysis capabilities
- [ ] **Caching System**: Analysis result caching for performance
- [ ] **Plugin System**: Extensible architecture for custom analysis
- [ ] **Web Interface**: Browser-based analysis dashboard

### Long-term Goals (2025+)

- [ ] **Machine Learning**: ML-enhanced analysis guidance
- [ ] **Distributed Analysis**: Cluster-based symbolic execution
- [ ] **Advanced Solvers**: Integration with additional SMT solvers
- [ ] **Industry Partnerships**: Collaborations with security tools

## ğŸš¨ Risks and Mitigations

### Current Risks

| Risk | Impact | Probability | Mitigation |
|------|--------|-------------|------------|
| **Z3 Solver Vulnerabilities** | High | Low | Regular dependency updates, monitoring |
| **Memory Exhaustion Attacks** | Medium | Medium | Hard memory limits, monitoring |
| **Code Injection Bypass** | High | Low | Comprehensive security reviews |
| **Performance Regression** | Medium | Medium | Performance testing, benchmarks |
| **Developer Burnout** | High | Medium | Community involvement, shared maintenance |

### Mitigation Strategies

- **Security**: Regular security audits, dependency monitoring
- **Performance**: Automated performance testing, alerting
- **Quality**: Comprehensive test suite, code reviews
- **Community**: Clear contribution guidelines, mentorship
- **Sustainability**: Funding discussions, partnerships
